scripts.seed:local: npm run switch:local && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run seed
scripts.seed:online: npm run switch:online && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run seed
scripts.switch:local: copy .env.local .env && echo Switched to LOCAL database
scripts.switch:online: copy .env.online .env && echo Switched to ONLINE database
scripts.local: npm run switch:local && npx prisma migrate dev && concurrently -n "NODEMON,STUDIO" -c "cyan,green" "nodemon src/server.js" "npx prisma studio"
scripts.online: npm run switch:online && npx prisma migrate dev && concurrently -n "NODEMON,STUDIO" -c "cyan,green" "nodemon src/server.js" "npx prisma studio"
